name: getPayorByIdV1
description:
Get a Single Payor by Id.

deprecated since v2.10 - Use /v2/payors

$ul: **address**
**city**
**country**
**countyOrProvince**
**line1**
**line2**
**line3**
**line4**
**zipOrPostcode**
**allowsLanguageChoice**: Whether or not the payor allows language choice in the UI.
**collectiveAlias**: How the payor has chosen to refer to payees.
**dbaName**: The payor’s 'Doing Business As' name.
**fundingAccountAccountName**: The funding account name to be used for the payor.
**fundingAccountAccountNumber**: The funding account number to be used for the payor.
**fundingAccountRoutingNumber**: The funding account routing number to be used for the payor.
**includesReports**
**kycState**: The kyc state of the payor. One of the following values: FAILED_KYC, PASSED_KYC, REQUIRES_KYC
**language**: The payor’s language preference. Must be one of [EN, FR].
**manualLockout**: Whether or not the payor has been manually locked by the backoffice.
**maxMasterPayorAdmins**
**payeeGracePeriodDays**: The grace period for paying payees in days.
**payeeGracePeriodProcessingEnabled**: Whether grace period processing is enabled.
**payorId**
**payorName**: The name of the payor.
**primaryContactEmail**: Primary contact email for the payor.
**primaryContactName**: Name of primary contact for the payor.
**primaryContactPhone**: Primary contact phone number for the payor.
**reminderEmailsOptOut**: Whether or not the payor has opted-out of reminder emails being sent.
**supportContact**: The payor’s support contact email address.
**transmissionTypes**
**ACH**: Whether the Payor is allowed to pay via ACH
**SAME_DAY_ACH**: Whether the Payor is allowed to pay via same day ACH
**WIRE**: Whether the Payor is allowed to pay via wire
**correlationId**: a unique identifier to track a request or related sequence of requests
**errors**: one or more errors
**httpStatusCode**: this will mirror the Status-Code part of the Status-Line http response header and is included for extra clarity
